title: Civic Engagement Assessment
description: Test your readiness for public participation in AI oversight

questions.question: What is the primary role of a public observer?
questions.explanation: Public observers provide oversight and accountability without making decisions.

questions.question: Public observers must have technical AI expertise.
questions.explanation: The protocol is designed for meaningful participation by non-technical citizens.

questions.question: How does the protocol ensure transparency?
options: Everything is public with no privacy
Graduated transparency based on context and consent
questions.explanation: The protocol uses graduated transparency that respects privacy while enabling oversight.
